pacman.model

类 Portal

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
          • pacman.model.Portal
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Portal
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
    This class defines a rectangular portal. The portal is with width of "1" and any unit height.
    作者:
    Zhangli Wang

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 javafx.scene.Node

        BASELINE_OFFSET_SAME_AS_HEIGHT

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Portal(double x, double y, java.lang.String orientation, double length)
      Initialize the portal with a position.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Portal

        public Portal(double x,
              double y,
              java.lang.String orientation,
              double length)
        Initialize the portal with a position. Width of the portal is "1". Hight of the portal is optional length.
        参数:
        x - - index of x
        y - - index of y
        orientation - - horizontal or vertical
        length - - the length of the bar (1 == 100px)
